Login.login_with: Log in with your CPF and password
Login.password_length: Password must be between 8 and 32 characters

Register.password_length: Password must be between 8 and 32 characters
Register.name: First name
Register.name_length: First name must contain at least 2 characters
Register.surname_length: Surname must contain at least 2 characters
Register.success: Your account has been created successfully!
Register.error: An error occurred while creating your account

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
ForgotPassword.description: Enter your CPF and we will send you an email with instructions to reset your password
ForgotPassword.success: All set! An email with password reset instructions has been sent to {email}
ForgotPassword.error: An error occurred while sending the password reset email

UpdatePassword.title: Password reset
UpdatePassword.description: Set a new password and confirm it to update
UpdatePassword.password_length: Password must be between 8 and 32 characters
UpdatePassword.password_confirmation_length: Password must be between 8 and 32 characters
UpdatePassword.passwords_must_match: The password and confirmation password do not match
UpdatePassword.success: All set! Your password has been updated and you can now log into your account!
UpdatePassword.error: An error occurred while trying to reset the password

features.title: Feature Flags
features.description: Select the features you want to activate for this city

table.name: Name
table.confirm_delete_title: Are you sure you want to delete this feature?
table.confirm_delete_description: Once deleted, the feature <bold>{featureName}</bold> cannot be recovered!

CreatePage.title: Create a feature flag
CreatePage.description: Fill out the form below to create a new feature
CreatePage.feature_name_length: Feature name must contain at least 2 characters
CreatePage.feature_description_length: Description must contain at least 10 characters
CreatePage.success: All set! The feature was created successfully!
CreatePage.error: An error occurred while creating the feature

EditPage.title: Edit a feature flag
EditPage.description: Fill out the form below to create a new feature
EditPage.feature_name_length: Feature name must be at least 2 characters long
EditPage.feature_description_length: The description must be at least 10 characters long
EditPage.success: All set! The feature has been successfully edited!
EditPage.error: An error occurred while editing the feature

actions.ASSIGNED_AS_MANAGER: {userName} assigned themselves as the responsible manager

types.WALL_RISK_OF_COLLAPSE: Wall or building at risk of collapse
types.EROSION: Erosion in public areas or riverbanks
types.TREE_COLLAPSE_RISK: Risk of tree or pole collapse
types.DARK_AREA: Area considered dangerous due to lack of lighting
types.GRAFFITI: Graffiti in public or private places
types.STRUCTURAL_RISK: Structural risk in public or private buildings

AccessPage.no_fiscal_yet: No auditor assigned yet. Click here to assign yourself!
AccessPage.no_manager_yet: No manager assigned yet. Click here to assign yourself!
AccessPage.assign_error: An error occurred while trying to assign you to this issue!
AccessPage.assign_success: All set! You have been assigned to this issue!
AccessPage.issue_needs_validation: Waiting for your issue validation. Click here to validate!
AccessPage.should_proceed: Is this issue real and needs a resolution?
AccessPage.should_proceed_info: Be honest and responsible when validating an issue. Validation is important to ensure that reported issues are real and need resolution.
AccessPage.add_a_comment_placeholder: What do you have to say about this issue?
AccessPage.accept_success: All set! The issue has been marked as valid!
AccessPage.accept_error: An error occurred while trying to mark the issue as valid!
AccessPage.close_success: All set! The issue was successfully closed!
AccessPage.close_error: An error occurred while trying to close the issue!
AccessPage.waiting_for_resolution_disclaimer: If there is no solution yet, just click the small X
AccessPage.waiting_for_resolution_info: If you think the issue doesn't make sense to be fixed, you can close the issue. Otherwise, add a resolution to the issue below.
AccessPage.resolution_success: All set! The resolution was successfully added!
AccessPage.resolution_error: An error occurred while trying to add the resolution to the issue!
AccessPage.validate_resolution: Time to validate the solution. Click here to validate!
AccessPage.is_resolution_valid: Does the proposed resolution solve the issue?
AccessPage.is_resolution_valid_info: If the proposed resolution solves the issue, leave a comment and click Yes. Otherwise, request a new resolution and click No.
AccessPage.accepting_resolution_success: All set! The issue was successfully resolved!
AccessPage.accepting_resolution_error: An error occurred while trying to mark the issue as resolved!
AccessPage.ask_new_resolution_success: All set! We requested a new resolution from the manager!
AccessPage.ask_new_resolution_error: An error occurred while trying to request a new resolution!

ReportPage.title: Report a problem
ReportPage.description: Fill out the form below to report a problem
ReportPage.issueType: What type of problem is it?
ReportPage.issue_description_placeholder: Provide as many details as possible
ReportPage.issue_description_length: Description must contain at least 30 characters
ReportPage.photos_limit_error: You can only upload up to 5 images
ReportPage.location_description: You can search in the field below and/or click on the map to add the location
ReportPage.success: All set! The problem was reported successfully!
ReportPage.error: An error occurred while reporting the problem
